code: const sgMail=require("@sendgrid/mail");sgMail.setApiKey(process.env.SENDGRID_API_KEY);export const sendEmail=()=>{const msg={to:"mikolaj.lesniczuk@gmail.com",from:"alpimix.kontakt@gmail.com",subject:"Sending with SendGrid is Fun",text:"and easy to do anywhere, even with Node.js",html:"and easy to do anywhere, even with Node.js"};sgMail.send(msg).then(()=>{console.log("Email sent");}).catch(error=>{console.error(error);});};
